ci_support_linux_64_python3.10.____cpyth:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Command line wrapper for pyright, a static type checker

Command line wrapper for pyright, a static type checker
Command line wrapper for pyright, a static type checker

name: pyright

about.summary: Command line wrapper for pyright, a static type checker
Command line wrapper for pyright, a static type checker

raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  name: pyright
  version: "1.1.408"

package:
  name: ${{ name|lower }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/${{ name[0] }}/${{ name }}/pyright-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: f28f2321f96852fa50b5829ea492f6adb0e6954568d1caa3f3af3a5f555eb684

build:
  number: 0
  script: ${{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  python:
    entry_points:
      - pyright=pyright.cli:entrypoint
      - pyright-python=pyright.cli:entrypoint
      - pyright-langserver=pyright.langserver:entrypoint
      - pyright-python-langserver=pyright.langserver:entrypoint

requirements:
  build:
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then:
        - python
        - cross-python_${{ target_platform }}
    - ${{ compiler('c') }}
    - ${{ stdlib('c') }}
  host:
    - pip
    - python
    - setuptools
  run:
    - nodeenv >=1.6.0
    - nodejs
    - python
    - typing_extensions >=4.1

tests:
  - python:
      imports:
        - pyright
      pip_check: true
  - script:
      - pyright --help
      - pyright-python --help
      - pyright-langserver --node-ipc
      - pyright-python-langserver --node-ipc

about:
  summary: Command line wrapper for pyright, a static type checker
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  homepage: https://github.com/RobertCraigie/pyright-python
  repository: https://github.com/RobertCraigie/pyright-python

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - thewchan

about.summary: Command line wrapper for pyright, a static type checker
